TopicTitle: Game crash looking for some ideas thx

Articles.Content: Hello I recently installed Interstellar the game loads up fine and gets thru the tree select fine but i get into the research bldg and the game crashes I have Kw and B9 installed as well but havent had any crashes before Interstellar

imo - running out of ram.

try running this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-23-Release-2-7-Active-Memory-Reduction-Mod
